section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Justice Lewis F. Powell, Jr.

turn.speaker: lewis_f_powell_jr
turn.label: Justice Lewis F. Powell, Jr.
turn.text: In the second of these cases, Bowen against the United States, No. 73-6848.
We hold that the search -- we hold that the ruling in the previous case does not apply retroactively to searches that occurred before the date of the decision in Almeida-Sanchez.
Mr. Justice Douglas, Mr. Justice Brennan, and Mr. Justice Marshall filed dissenting statements.
